about_the_game: This demo consists of a remixed debate from the early chapters of Pro Philosopher 2, demonstrating the gameplay and personality of the game without spoiling too much of the overall stakes and mystery. Playtime is ~30 minutes.
detailed_description: This demo consists of a remixed debate from the early chapters of Pro Philosopher 2, demonstrating the gameplay and personality of the game without spoiling too much of the overall stakes and mystery. Playtime is ~30 minutes.
name: Pro Philosopher 2: First Chapter Demo
short_description: Play the first chapter of Pro Philosopher 2: tackling the most important philosophical question: When and how much should one party? Saves will carry to the main game!
